data.text: 3) People think they are “following the science” but scientists do not all agree that this is safe & effective. Please get the other side before pushing it. How long before they won’t let us do anything without it? Taking away our freedom.

2) I am not against vaccinations in general, but to push this on people the way they are for a disease that has a 99.9+ chance of recovery AND has treatments that would work if they would stop blocking them (HCQ & Ivermectin) is just plain WRONG.
